import React, {useState} from "react" import classes from "./Meal.module.css" import MealForm from "./MealForm" const Meal = (props)=>{ const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(1) console.log(props) const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const handleQuantity =()=>{ setQuantity((prev) => prev + 1) } return(

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}

    {price}

    • ) } export default Meal
